channel.title: How to not waste your traffic on silly A/B tests
channel.description:
Hi all,
I've seen people waste their time and traffic on A/B tests that don't have a good chance of producing results.
So I wrote a blog post about what I've learned: http://userprof.it/qualitative-research/
I'd love feedback or questions!

item.title: How to not waste your traffic on silly A/B tests
item.dc:creator: DLJ
item.description:
Nice, some good links in there too

Thanks for sharing

Read full topic
item.source: How to not waste your traffic on silly A/B tests
